t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Customer Behavior Analytics to Grow Your Brand
s: Get the data you need to assess customer satisfaction, build customer loyalty, and earn more repeat business. Improve customer engagement and drive repeat purchases The Repeat Purchase Behavior dashboard provides a detailed breakdown of how often customers repeatedly buy from your brand.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.
